defs.docs: A Piston event loop for games and interactive applications

attributes.value: / A Piston event loop for games and interactive applications
deny(missing_docs)
deny(missing_copy_implementations)

defs.name: EventSettings
defs.value: EventSettings { max_fps, ups, ups_reset, swap_buffers, bench_mode, lazy }
defs.docs: Stores event loop settings.

attributes.value: / Stores event loop settings.

defs.name: max_fps
defs.docs: The maximum number of frames per second

attributes.value: / The maximum number of frames per second
/ The frame rate can be lower because the
/ next frame is always scheduled from the previous frame.
/ This causes the frames to "slip" over time.

defs.name: ups
defs.docs: The number of updates per second

attributes.value: / The number of updates per second
/ This is the fixed update rate on average over time.
/ If the event loop lags, it will try to catch up.
/ When set to `0`, update events are disabled.

defs.name: ups_reset
defs.docs:
The number of delayed updates before skipping them to catch up.
 When set to `0`, it will always try to catch up.

attributes.value: / The number of delayed updates before skipping them to catch up.
/ When set to `0`, it will always try to catch up.

defs.name: swap_buffers
defs.docs: Enable or disable automatic swapping of buffers.

attributes.value: / Enable or disable automatic swapping of buffers.

defs.name: bench_mode
defs.docs:
Enable or disable benchmark mode.
 When enabled, it will render and update without sleep and ignore input.
 Used to test performance by playing through as fast as possible.
 Requires `lazy` to be set to `false`.

attributes.value: / Enable or disable benchmark mode.
/ When enabled, it will render and update without sleep and ignore input.
/ Used to test performance by playing through as fast as possible.
/ Requires `lazy` to be set to `false`.

defs.name: lazy
defs.docs:
Enable or disable rendering only when receiving input.
 When enabled, update and idle events are disabled.

attributes.value: / Enable or disable rendering only when receiving input.
/ When enabled, update and idle events are disabled.

defs.name: new
defs.docs: Creates new with default settings.

attributes.value: / Creates new with default settings.

defs.name: Events
defs.docs: An event loop iterator

attributes.value: / An event loop iterator
/ *Warning: Because the iterator polls events from the window back-end,
/ it must be used on the same thread as the window back-end (usually main thread),
/ unless the window back-end supports multi-thread event polling.*

defs.name: set_bench_mode
defs.docs:
Enable or disable benchmark mode.
 When enabled, it will render and update without sleep and ignore input.
 Used to test performance by playing through as fast as possible.
 Requires `lazy` to be set to `false`.

defs.name: set_lazy
defs.docs:
Enable or disable rendering only when receiving input.
 When enabled, update events are disabled.
 Idle events are emitted while receiving input.

/ When enabled, update events are disabled.
